name: K-Diamond-K Guest Ranch

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It doesn't get any more real than this. The family that runs this place opens up every ranch experience possible for it's guests to enjoy. On the other hand, if ropin', ridin' and shootin' aren't your cup of tea, it's still a magnificent place to stay as I witnessed this last weekend.
reviews.title: Ranch-life that's authentic.

reviews.text: We opted for the Bed and Breakfast plan instead of the all-inclusive Dude Ranch experience.
reviews.title: Authentic Ranch Experience- feels like a world away!!!

reviews.text: Our room was huge and comfortable. The decor solid western right down to the horses on the sheets, hand-made quilts and the saddle slung across one of the logs in the wall. Modern bathroom facilities provided all the hot water you would ever need, even though it was a full house.
reviews.title: Great Weekend Escape

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The inclusive breakfast was good and hearty and served buffet style. Take as much as you want of the fried potatoes, eggs, incredible thick-cut bacon, french toast or pancakes, fresh fruit and yogurt parfaits. It was all delicious.
reviews.title: Authentic Outdoor Experience - Great Family Getaway

reviews.text: After breakfast many guests saddled up and went for a morning ride through the beautiful green hills. I settled in on the front porch to listen to the rooster crow, watch the bunnies munching on the flowers and the Longhorn cattle (plus an African Watusi bull!) graze on the grass in the yard. It was peaceful and serene. Later we hiked up through the hills and enjoyed the fresh air and scenery.
reviews.title: Winter Wonderland

description: An Old West adventure open year round. New elegantly rustic log lodge with large fireplaces, 14 rooms, and spacious lounge & dining. An all-inclusive guest ranch vacation for all ages. Lodging, meals, horseback riding, cattle drives, fishing, hunting, fossil digging, a gold mine to explor and many other ranch activities to enjoy. Whether a get-away by youself, a romantic vacation with a loved one or a family adventure... a variety of fun activities and special outings await you.
